org.vadere.util.geometry.shapes

Class VTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Path2D
      • java.awt.geom.Path2D.Double
        • org.vadere.util.geometry.shapes.VPolygon
          • org.vadere.util.geometry.shapes.VTriangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, VShape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataTriangle

    public class VTriangle
extends VPolygon
    A triangle. Points must be given in counter clockwise manner to get correct inward facing normals.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
